text:
July 28, 1959
Mr. James W. Armsey
Associate Program Director
Education Division
The Ford Foundation
477 Madison Avenue
New York 22, New York
Dear Jim:
I am taking the liberty of sending you a copy of our forthcoming
NAEB Network offering. I thought you might be interested in what
the nation's educational radio network is doing. I also thought
you might have particular interest in the programs listed on
pages 9, 10, 13, 14, 19, 20, 23, 39, 41, 44, 45, 52, and 53.
Sincerely,
hjsnrs
Harry J. Skomia
Executive Director
